query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alerts (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, account_id INT, post_id INT, campaign_id INT, alert_type ENUM('viral_post', 'negative_comments', 'goal_achieved', 'underperforming', 'toxic_comment', 'engagement_spike', 'follower_milestone', 'best_performing', 'requires_response') NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, message TEXT NOT NULL, severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'error', 'success') DEFAULT 'info' NOT NULL, action_url VARCHAR(500), action_label VARCHAR(100), is_read BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, read_at TIMESTAMP, notified_via_email BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, notified_via_push BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS agent_runs (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, run_type ENUM('comment_analysis', 'visual_analysis', 'performance_check', 'campaign_analysis', 'trend_detection', 'full_scan') NOT NULL, account_id INT, post_id INT, campaign_id INT, status ENUM('running', 'completed', 'failed') DEFAULT 'running' NOT NULL, progress VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '0', items_processed INT DEFAULT 0, insights_generated INT DEFAULT 0, alerts_created INT DEFAULT 0, error_message TEXT, started_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, completed_at TIMESTAMP, duration_ms INT, metadata JSON); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS agent_settings (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE, comment_analysis_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, comment_analysis_frequency INT DEFAULT 60, visual_analysis_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, performance_check_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, performance_check_frequency INT DEFAULT 240, trend_detection_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, trend_detection_frequency INT DEFAULT 1440, alerts_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, email_alerts_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, push_alerts_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, alert_types JSON, minimum_alert_severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'error') DEFAULT 'warning', auto_response_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, auto_response_to_questions BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, auto_response_to_praise BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, auto_response_to_complaints BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, underperforming_threshold VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '0.5', negative_sentiment_threshold VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '0.3', toxic_comment_threshold VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '0.7', track_campaigns_by_default BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4FiUfikgDQU4MHP.4fff9066d80d --database U34NkkLJbrpbDaDFLXHvpq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alerts (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, account_id INT, post_id INT, campaign_id INT, alert_type ENUM('viral_post', 'negative_comments', 'goal_achieved', 'underperforming', 'toxic_comment', 'engagement_spike', 'follower_milestone', 'best_performing', 'requires_response') NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, message TEXT NOT NULL, severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'error', 'success') DEFAULT 'info' NOT NULL, action_url VARCHAR(500), action_label VARCHAR(100), is_read BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, read_at TIMESTAMP, notified_via_email BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, notified_via_push BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS agent_runs (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, run_type ENUM('comment_analysis', 'visual_analysis', 'performance_check', 'campaign_analysis', 'trend_detection', 'full_scan') NOT NULL, account_id INT, post_id INT, campaign_id INT, status ENUM('running', 'completed', 'failed') DEFAULT 'running' NOT NULL, progress VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '0', items_processed INT DEFAULT 0, insights_generated INT DEFAULT 0, alerts_created INT DEFAULT 0, error_message TEXT, started_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, completed_at TIMESTAMP, duration_ms INT, metadata JSON); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS agent_settings (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE, comment_analysis_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, comment_analysis_frequency INT DEFAULT 60, visual_analysis_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, performance_check_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, performance_check_frequency INT DEFAULT 240, trend_detection_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, trend_detection_frequency INT DEFAULT 1440, alerts_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, email_alerts_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, push_alerts_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, alert_types JSON, minimum_alert_severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'error') DEFAULT 'warning', auto_response_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, auto_response_to_questions BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, auto_response_to_praise BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, auto_response_to_complaints BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, underperforming_threshold VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '0.5', negative_sentiment_threshold VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '0.3', toxic_comment_threshold VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '0.7', track_campaigns_by_default BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
